channel.title: lxd privesc on 7own
channel.description: Recent content in lxd privesc on 7own

item.title: Tabby
item.description: Let’s start with NMAP on the IP of the box 10.10.10.194 : As we can see, some interesting protocols: 22 / SSH 80 / HTTP 8080 / TOMCAT Let’s check the website : We can observe a call to a file in the url : news.php?file=statement Try LFI, jackpot Find usernames : ash lxd tomcat After google research, i’ve find the path of the tomcat-users.xml file /usr/share/tomcat9/etc/tomcat-users.xml First user :
